page.title: 05 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We compared the jobs of people in Sapperton with jobs in 1851 and found one big difference. Then there was employment for all within the village boudaries but today 25 spend their day out of the village. These work outside the parish, Sawyer 1, Council worker 1, Gamekeeper 1, Basket maker 1, Welder 1, Garage cashier 1, Restaurateur 1, Teacher 5, Musician 1, Golf Manager 1, Bookseller 1, Apprentice 2, Dustman 1, Buyer 1, School Matron 1, R.A.F. employee 2, Company Director 2, Lord Bathurst's Agent 1. These work within the parish, retired men 19, retired ladies 21, agricultural workers 2,Farmer 1, housewives 23, grooms 5, victuallers 4, cook 1, Postmistress 1, architects 2, Policeman 1, Under 5s 5, Scholars 27,Unemployed 2, not stated 7.
